    "comment": [
        "See A191203."
    ],

    ],
    "example": [
        "1 -> 0,3 -> 4,8,9,27 ->"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "g=12; Union[Flatten[NestList[{3#,Floor[(#^2)/2]}&,1,g]]]",
